description: The CoSE layout for Cytoscape.js by the i-Vis group in Bilkent University. It is an evolution of the CoSE algorithm that is more computationally expensive but produces near-perfect results

animate.description: Whether to transition the node positions

fit.description: Whether to fit the viewport to the graph

nestingFactor.description: Nesting factor (multiplier) to compute ideal edge length for nested edges

numIter.description: Maximum number of iterations to perform

padding.description: The padding on fit in pixels

randomize.description: Randomize the initial positions of the nodes (true) or use existing positions (false)

refresh.description: Number of iterations between consecutive screen positions update (0 -> only updated on the end)

tilingPaddingHorizontal.description: Represents the amount of the horizontal space to put between the zero degree members during the tiling operation

tilingPaddingVertical.description: Represents the amount of the vertical space to put between the zero degree members during the tiling operation
